name: help
description: Prints a list of available commands and their descriptions

name: syntax
description: Prints an explanation of a command's syntax.

name: element
description: Prints an explanation of a command element (i.e. <position> etc.)

elements.name: position
elements.description:
Position can be declared in one of the following ways: 

 <x>,<y>,<z> | selected | here    
 (i.e. either coordinates, the position of the currently selected wasp or the current camera position)

elements.name: entity
elements.description:
An entity can be one of the following: 

 wasp    
 (just wasps for now)

elements.name: spawn-strat
elements.description:
A spawn strategy can be one of the following: 

 point - Spawns all entities at the exact point given 
 random <radius> - Spawns the entities randomly within the given radius around the given point

elements.name: kill-strat
elements.description:
A kill strategy can be one of the following: 

 random - Chooses the specific entities to kill randomly    
 (just random for now)

name: wasp
description: Allows editing the currently selected wasp. Type 'wasp help' for more information.

subcommands.name: help
subcommands.description: Prints a list of available wasp commands and their descriptions.

subcommands.name: sethp
subcommands.description: Sets the health points of the selected wasp

subcommands.name: sethunger
subcommands.description: Sets the hunger saturation of the selected wasp
